Class ControllerIoImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Storable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlarmImpl, DeviceImpl, FlowStreamImpl, LCSIndicationImpl
public abstract class ControllerIoImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements ControllerIO
ControllerIoImpl is an abstract class for controller I/O.
Author:
Douglas Lau
